name: 2024 4th Asia Environment Pollution and Prevention Conference
content: Paper Publishing: Papers submitted to AEPP 2024 after the peer reviewing process by at least 2-3 experts, the accepted papers will be published into an issue of International Journal of Environmental Science and Development (IJESD, ISSN:2010-0264), which will be indexed by Scopus (CiteScore 2022: 1.4) and Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), CABI, Ulrich Periodicals Directory, Electronic Journals Library, Crossref, ProQuest
